Uses of Class
Game.MoveableCharacter

    • Uses of MoveableCharacter in Game

      Subclasses of MoveableCharacter in Game 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FireAttack
      This class represents a fire attack which a Player can create.

      The FireAttack will move until it hits an opposing Player or reach the end of the screen.
      class  Heart
      This class represents a heart.
      class  Player
      This class represents a player in the game.

      It handles its connection and communication to the server, its movement, its state (such as the amount of health left) and its actions (such as attacking the other characters)
      class  Sprite
      This class represents a sprite animation character.
      It handles the changing of the Sprite's costumes.
      Methods in Game with parameters of type MoveableCharacter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean MoveableCharacter.isTouching(MoveableCharacter otherCharacter)
      This method determines if the instance of the MoveableCharacter is touching the MoveableCharacter given as an argument
